Reviews.Title: Wish I had a review like this to read before purchasing.
Reviews.Author: Mo
Reviews.Content: A product is only as good as the technical support. Call 877-755-6739 for the technical support before you buy any LOREX product. Your hold time will be 2+hrs and if its closing time a recording says call back during hours...That's after being on hold for 1.5hrs!!!!THEY ARE CLOSED ON THE WEEKENDS TOO!!!it's too bad because the system seems like it would be really nice if I could get it to work right.

ProductInfo.Features:
Pre-installed 1TB HDD
Simultaneous Playback and Live view on the same screen
LOREX Easy Connect Internet Set-up Wizard
ProductInfo.Name: Lorex LNR241C2B Full HD 1080p 4-Channel Security System with 2 IP Bullet Cameras and 1TB HDD (White)
